articles.title: Oluchi Okananwa leads the way with 26 points and No. 14 Maryland women rout Purdue 99-66
articles.original_title: Oluchi Okananwa leads the way with 26 points and No. 14 Maryland women rout Purdue 99-66
articles.summary: COLLEGE PARK, Md. (AP) — Oluchi Okananwa scored 26 points, leading six in double figures, and No. 14 Maryland won its fifth straight game, defeating Purdue 99-66 on Sunday.Addi Mack scored 14 points and Saylor Poffenbarger and Mir McLean added 11 each for Maryland (22-6, 10-6 Big Ten).
